      • getMimeType

        public static java.lang.String getMimeType(java.util.List<org.alfresco.webservice.types.NamedValue> contentProperties)
        This method returns the mimetype of the default content defined for the node. Notice that more than one binary can be defined in a custom model of Alfresco and also that it could exist some contents that don't have a binary
        Parameters:
        contentProperties -
        Returns:
        mimetype of the default content property
